title: Analyze Impact of Market Rule Change
description: The ISO has proposed a new market rule for how energy storage participates in the capacity market. An analyst needs to assess its financial impact on their battery portfolio.

tasks.description: Retrieve and summarize the proposed market rule change documentation from the ISO website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear summary of the key changes.

tasks.description: Model the potential revenue for a battery asset under the current market rules.
Re-run the revenue model under the proposed new rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the revenue under the new rule set.

tasks.description: Quantify the financial impact of the rule change and draft a comment to submit to the ISO.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the rule change would decrease revenue by 10% and drafts a formal comment outlining the concern.
